paper_meta.Paper_title: A molecular test based on RT-LAMP for rapid, sensitive and inexpensive colorimetric detection of SARS-CoV-2 in clinical samples.

protocols.Paper_title: A molecular test based on RT-LAMP for rapid, sensitive and inexpensive colorimetric detection of SARS-CoV-2 in clinical samples
Methods: other:purified RNA extracted from nasopharyngeal (NP) fluid used as input for RT-LAMP benchmarking vs RT-PCR (RNA extraction method not described in provided pages)

protocols.Paper_title: A molecular test based on RT-LAMP for rapid, sensitive and inexpensive colorimetric detection of SARS-CoV-2 in clinical samples
Methods: other:saliva pre-treatment included heat inactivation followed by a brief centrifugation; supernatant diluted with TE prior to RT-LAMP (stated TE is LAMP-compatible)

protocols.Paper_title: A molecular test based on RT-LAMP for rapid, sensitive and inexpensive colorimetric detection of SARS-CoV-2 in clinical samples
Methods: other:RNA extracted from saliva using plasmid DNA miniprep columns (Zymo Research ZR Plasmid Miniprep-Classic Kit) and re-analyzed by RT-LAMP

protocols.Paper_title: A molecular test based on RT-LAMP for rapid, sensitive and inexpensive colorimetric detection of SARS-CoV-2 in clinical samples.
Methods: other:column-based RNA extraction/purification (QIAGEN Viral RNA Mini Kit; QIAGEN RNeasy Mini Kit; Zymo plasmid miniprep columns; ethanol/salt washes)

protocols.Paper_title: A molecular test based on RT-LAMP for rapid, sensitive and inexpensive colorimetric detection of SARS-CoV-2 in clinical samples
protocols.Provenance: Provided page shows author contributions/competing interests/additional information; no sample-prep protocol described on this page.
